title: 'Zelenskyy ready for peace': Trump spills the tea over his meetings with world leaders
content: During his Paris visit, President Trump revealed President Zelenskyy's newfound desire for peace in Ukraine. Trump discussed potential resolutions with Zelenskyy and emphasized the need for NATO members to contribute fairly. He also had a cordial exchange with Jill Biden at Notre Dame, praising the cathedral's restoration.
summary: During his Paris visit, President Trump revealed President Zelenskyy's newfound desire for peace in Ukraine. Trump discussed potential resolutions with Zelenskyy and emphasized the need for NATO members to contribute fairly. He also had a cordial exchange with Jill Biden at Notre Dame, praising the cathedral's restoration.

title: A new history is being written in the region after Syria win: Jolani
content: Syrian rebels triumphantly entered Damascus, ending the years-long war and toppling President Assad. Rebel leader Jolani addressed a crowd, proclaiming a new era for the region and promising a brighter future for Syria. The rebel coalition initiated the transition of power, while the former PM called for free elections. Released prisoners celebrated their newfound freedom in the streets of Damascus.
summary: Syrian rebels triumphantly entered Damascus, ending the years-long war and toppling President Assad.  Rebel leader Jolani addressed a crowd, proclaiming a new era for the region and promising a brighter future for Syria.  The rebel coalition initiated the transition of power, while the former PM called for free elections.  Released prisoners celebrated their newfound freedom in the streets of Damascus.

title: 'A fragrance your enemy can't resist': Trump uses photo with Jill Biden to sell his new perfume
content: At the Notre Dame reopening, a shared moment between President-elect Trump and Jill Biden became the subject of a Trump perfume ad. Trump posted a screenshot of a smiling Biden with the tagline, "A fragrance your enemies can't resist," promoting his "Fight Fight Fight" line. The $199 fragrance sparked humorous reactions online, with some speculating about Biden's voting preferences.
summary: At the Notre Dame reopening, a shared moment between President-elect Trump and Jill Biden became the subject of a Trump perfume ad.  Trump posted a screenshot of a smiling Biden with the tagline, "A fragrance your enemies can't resist," promoting his "Fight Fight Fight" line.  The $199 fragrance sparked humorous reactions online, with some speculating about Biden's voting preferences.

title: Meghan Markle hailed as ‘symbol of resilience against adversity’: Royal commentator
content: Meghan Markle is viewed as a symbol of resilience by many in the US as she navigates the complexities of her post-royal life. Her openness, along with Prince Harry's mental health advocacy, resonates with Americans who value breaking free from constraints and addressing personal struggles. Harry's memoir and television appearances have further highlighted his journey with anxiety and agoraphobia.
summary: Meghan Markle is viewed as a symbol of resilience by many in the US as she navigates the complexities of her post-royal life.  Her openness, along with Prince Harry's mental health advocacy, resonates with Americans who value breaking free from constraints and addressing personal struggles.  Harry's memoir and television appearances have further highlighted his journey with anxiety and agoraphobia.

title: Health insurance under scrutiny following UnitedHealthcare CEO's assassination
content: The assassination of UnitedHealthcare's CEO has sparked scrutiny of health insurance practices, particularly the "delay, deny, defend" allegations. The privatization of Medicaid and Medicare, along with rising prior authorization denials, are fueling the debate. The future of ACA subsidies remains uncertain, with potential coverage losses under a Trump administration.
summary: The assassination of UnitedHealthcare's CEO has sparked scrutiny of health insurance practices, particularly the "delay, deny, defend" allegations.  The privatization of Medicaid and Medicare, along with rising prior authorization denials, are fueling the debate.  The future of ACA subsidies remains uncertain, with potential coverage losses under a Trump administration.

title: FDA considers banning controversial red food dye linked to health risks
content: The FDA is poised to ban Red 3, a synthetic food dye linked to cancer and behavioral problems in children. Used in thousands of products, the dye has already been banned from cosmetics. The potential ban follows California's lead and aligns with stricter European standards, addressing growing public health concerns.
summary: The FDA is poised to ban Red 3, a synthetic food dye linked to cancer and behavioral problems in children.  Used in thousands of products, the dye has already been banned from cosmetics.  The potential ban follows California's lead and aligns with stricter European standards, addressing growing public health concerns.

title: 'Fundamental act of justice': US President Joe Biden on fall of Assad govt in Syria
content: US President Biden declared the Assad regime's collapse in Syria a "fundamental act of justice" but acknowledged the risks. While crediting US efforts, he expressed concern over the rebel group's past, confirming continued US troop presence to combat ISIS and pursue the return of journalist Austin Tice.
summary: US President Biden declared the Assad regime's collapse in Syria a "fundamental act of justice" but acknowledged the risks.  While crediting US efforts, he expressed concern over the rebel group's past, confirming continued US troop presence to combat ISIS and pursue the return of journalist Austin Tice.

title: Photographer Hannah Kobayashi’s disappearance linked to mystery man and a potential scam
content: Photographer Hannah Kobayashi, who disappeared from Los Angeles, was seen spending nine hours with a man before traveling to Mexico. Police cleared the man of any involvement, confirming Kobayashi left alone and voluntarily crossed the border. A possible marriage scam involving an Argentinian man and family tensions further complicate the situation.
summary: Photographer Hannah Kobayashi, who disappeared from Los Angeles, was seen spending nine hours with a man before traveling to Mexico.  Police cleared the man of any involvement, confirming Kobayashi left alone and voluntarily crossed the border.  A possible marriage scam involving an Argentinian man and family tensions further complicate the situation.

title: Senator Ernst raises concerns over Hegseth’s nomination for defence secretary
content: Senator Joni Ernst, a combat veteran, expresses reservations about Pete Hegseth's nomination for defense secretary, citing concerns about his views on women in combat and past allegations. Hegseth faces scrutiny over sexual assault accusations and a lack of Pentagon experience, while other Republican senators also seek further information before confirming his nomination.
summary: Senator Joni Ernst, a combat veteran, expresses reservations about Pete Hegseth's nomination for defense secretary, citing concerns about his views on women in combat and past allegations.  Hegseth faces scrutiny over sexual assault accusations and a lack of Pentagon experience, while other Republican senators also seek further information before confirming his nomination.

title: Syrian ousted president Bashar al-Assad in Russia: Report
content: Bashar al-Assad and his family have found asylum in Moscow after fleeing Damascus as Islamist-led opposition forces took control of the Syrian capital. Celebrations erupted in Syria following the rebels' swift advance, ending the Assad family's five-decade rule.
summary: Bashar al-Assad and his family have found asylum in Moscow after fleeing Damascus as Islamist-led opposition forces took control of the Syrian capital. Celebrations erupted in Syria following the rebels' swift advance, ending the Assad family's five-decade rule.

title: Internet reacts as Trump and Jill Biden share candid moment at Notre Dame reopening
content: During the reopening of Notre Dame Cathedral, President-elect Donald Trump and outgoing First Lady Jill Biden shared a warm, viral moment. This fueled online speculation about Jill Biden's stance on Trump, particularly given prior instances interpreted by some as signs of covert support.
summary: During the reopening of Notre Dame Cathedral, President-elect Donald Trump and outgoing First Lady Jill Biden shared a warm, viral moment. This fueled online speculation about Jill Biden's stance on Trump, particularly given prior instances interpreted by some as signs of covert support.

title: Brian Thompson case: Nationwide manhunt for UnitedHealthCare CEO’s killer continues
content: A nationwide manhunt is underway for the gunman who fatally shot UnitedHealthCare CEO Brian Thompson in Midtown Manhattan. The suspect, seen fleeing on an electric bike and later in a taxi, is believed to have left New York City shortly after the attack. A backpack possibly belonging to the suspect was found in Central Park.
summary: A nationwide manhunt is underway for the gunman who fatally shot UnitedHealthCare CEO Brian Thompson in Midtown Manhattan. The suspect, seen fleeing on an electric bike and later in a taxi, is believed to have left New York City shortly after the attack. A backpack possibly belonging to the suspect was found in Central Park.

title: 'Assad is gone': Trump, Netanyahu, other world leaders react to Damascus falling to rebels
When USA called Syria rebel leader Abu Mohammed al-Jolani a terrorist
content: In 2017, the US Embassy in Syria declared Abu Mohammed al-Jolani, leader of Hay’at Tahrir al-Sham (HTS), a terrorist. The US asserted that HTS, despite rebranding efforts, remained an al-Qaeda extension, with Jolani at its helm. This designation highlighted the complex dynamics of the Syrian conflict and raised questions about US involvement with extremist groups.
summary: In 2017, the US Embassy in Syria declared Abu Mohammed al-Jolani, leader of Hay’at Tahrir al-Sham (HTS), a terrorist.  The US asserted that HTS, despite rebranding efforts, remained an al-Qaeda extension, with Jolani at its helm.  This designation highlighted the complex dynamics of the Syrian conflict and raised questions about US involvement with extremist groups.

title: Deport all Illegal immigrants, exit Nato, pardon Jan 6 defendants: Trump lays out his agenda
content: In his first post-election interview, President-elect Trump outlined his second-term agenda, including pardons for January 6th rioters, ending birthright citizenship, and mass deportations. He also discussed potential NATO withdrawal, tariffs, and a more unifying message than his previous inaugural address. Surprisingly, Trump met with Macron and Zelenskyy in Paris after the interview to discuss peace in Ukraine.
summary: In his first post-election interview, President-elect Trump outlined his second-term agenda, including pardons for January 6th rioters, ending birthright citizenship, and mass deportations.  He also discussed potential NATO withdrawal, tariffs, and a more unifying message than his previous inaugural address.  Surprisingly, Trump met with Macron and Zelenskyy in Paris after the interview to discuss peace in Ukraine.

title: 'Child's first heartbreak shouldn't be from father', says Roberts as Hunter Biden yet to meet their daughter
content: Lunden Roberts, mother of Hunter Biden's child, reveals his continued absence from their daughter's life. Hunter has not met Navy and stopped communicating with her eight months ago. Roberts and Biden had a relationship between 2016 and 2018. A DNA test confirmed Hunter's paternity. Roberts claims Hunter has missed key moments in Navy's life.
summary: Lunden Roberts, mother of Hunter Biden's child, reveals his continued absence from their daughter's life. Hunter has not met Navy and stopped communicating with her eight months ago. Roberts and Biden had a relationship between 2016 and 2018. A DNA test confirmed Hunter's paternity. Roberts claims Hunter has missed key moments in Navy's life.

title: Fall of Assad: Israel PM says military has seized buffer zone in Golan Heights
content: Israeli forces secured a buffer zone in the Golan Heights after Syrian rebels ousted President Bashar al-Assad, ending his family's rule. Prime Minister Netanyahu declared this a "historic day," attributing it to Israeli actions against Iran and Hezbollah, Assad's allies. Israel's annexation of the Golan Heights remains internationally disputed.
summary: Israeli forces secured a buffer zone in the Golan Heights after Syrian rebels ousted President Bashar al-Assad, ending his family's rule.  Prime Minister Netanyahu declared this a "historic day," attributing it to Israeli actions against Iran and Hezbollah, Assad's allies.  Israel's annexation of the Golan Heights remains internationally disputed.

title: Chinese woman wins over Rs 1 lakh for being away from phone for 8 hours
content: A woman in China won 10,000 yuan after successfully abstaining from mobile phone use for eight hours in a competition. Ten contestants lay on beds in a shopping mall, prohibited from using electronic devices except for basic calls. The winner, nicknamed "pyjama sister," maintained the lowest anxiety levels and spent the most time in bed, achieving a score of 88.99.
summary: A woman in China won 10,000 yuan after successfully abstaining from mobile phone use for eight hours in a competition.  Ten contestants lay on beds in a shopping mall, prohibited from using electronic devices except for basic calls.  The winner, nicknamed "pyjama sister," maintained the lowest anxiety levels and spent the most time in bed, achieving a score of 88.99.

title: Why United is taking families to 'North Pole' on free 'fantasy flights'
content: United Airlines launched its Fantasy Flights program, taking children facing hardship on a magical journey to the 'North Pole.' Flight 3894 from Honolulu marked the start, with 125 children and their families enjoying a festive experience. Thirteen such flights are planned across the globe, spreading holiday cheer to families affected by military loss or childhood cancer.
summary: United Airlines launched its Fantasy Flights program, taking children facing hardship on a magical journey to the 'North Pole.'  Flight 3894 from Honolulu marked the start, with 125 children and their families enjoying a festive experience.  Thirteen such flights are planned across the globe, spreading holiday cheer to families affected by military loss or childhood cancer.

title: Where Turkey stands as Syrian government falls to opposition insurgents
